markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=536) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 176 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Twin Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=523)

</column>

---

At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to perform a [Twin Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=523) against your hunted prey. You can use this extra reaction even if you are not benefiting from [Twin Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=377).
name: Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger)
search_markdown:
<traits>

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You are able to riposte an additional time per turn.
</summary>
summary: You are able to riposte an additional time per turn.

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 16" pfs="Standard" > Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger) Source Core Rulebook pg. 176 4.0 Prerequisites Twin Riposte --- At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to perform a Twin Riposte against your hunted prey. You can use this extra reaction even if you are not benefiting from Twin Parry.
